## SequelizeCrudRepository.buildSequelizeOrder() method

Get Sequelize Order filter value from loopback style order value

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected buildSequelizeOrder(order?: string[] | string): Order | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  order | string\[\] \| string | _(Optional)_ Sorting order in loopback style filter. eg. <code>title ASC</code>, <code>[&quot;id DESC&quot;, &quot;age ASC&quot;]</code> |

**Returns:**

Order \| undefined

Sequelize compatible order filter value
